title: Nina Thècle Ahishakiye — MBA Portfolio
text:
Profile Summary
Strategic and solutions-driven MBA Candidate with 5+ years of experience in project coordination, stakeholder engagement, and international development operations across 34 countries in Africa and the EU. Proven ability to deliver complex initiatives with efficiency, diplomacy, and strong cross-cultural communication. Passionate about operational excellence, public–private partnerships, and leveraging data-driven insights to strengthen organizational performance.

title: Nina Thècle Ahishakiye — MBA Portfolio
text:
Core Competencies

 Project Management  Data Analysis  Process Improvement  Team Leadership  Research & Reporting  Risk & Compliance  Multilingual Communication  Business Analytics  Event & Logistics

title: Nina Thecle Ahishakiye
text:
Professional Experience/ Highlights

Orchestrated high-level missions and engagements across Africa and the EU — improving collaboration and timely execution.
Managed research and analysis projects with actionable deliverables impacting 600+ healthcare institutions in East Europe.
Launched education and public health initiatives that impacted communities and supported disease outbreak response.

title: Nina Thecle Ahishakiye
text:
Key Achievements

Supported policy-influencing AML/CFT initiatives in Eastern, Southern & Central Africa.

Coordinated five NGO fundraising projects and expanded chapters across four countries.

Delivered community health interventions in clinics and led cholera outbreak responses.

title: Nina Thecle Ahishakiye
text:
Education

Master of Business Administration (MBA) — University Canada West (Ongoing)

Professional Certificate: Psychology & Peer Counselling

title: About Nina
text: I am an MBA Candidate at University Canada West with experience in project coordination, stakeholder engagement, and research across Africa and Europe. This page can include a short bio, focus areas, and contact details.

title: Nina Thecle Ahishakiye
text:
Introduction
Hi, I’m Nina Thècle Ahishakiye, a project operations and stakeholder engagement professional working at the intersection of development, governance, and global collaboration.
I have 5 years of international experience leading coordination efforts across 34 countries in Eastern, Southern, and Central Africa, driving efficient project delivery, multi-stakeholder alignment, and high-quality reporting within complex environments. My work lies in creating order in high-impact spaces, whether moderating multinational security conferences, streamlining systems that enhance productivity, or guiding culturally diverse teams toward shared goals. I am currently pursuing my MBA at University Canada West, strengthening my strategic and analytical capabilities to shape global initiatives through modern governance, operational excellence, and data-driven decision-making.

title: Nina Thecle Ahishakiye
text:
